text: The Pernambuco Brasil Open Series is a tennis tournament held in Recife, Brazil since 2011. The event is part of the ATP Challenger Tour and is played on hard courts. ==Past finals== ===Singles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font- size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champion !width="200"|Runner-up !width="100"|Score |- | 2011 || Tatsuma Ito || Tiago Fernandes || walkover |} ===Doubles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champions !width="200"|Runners-up !width="100"|Score |- |2011 || Giovanni Lapentti Fernando Romboli || André Ghem Rodrigo Guidolin || 6–2, 6–1 |} ==References== Category:ATP Challenger Tour Category:Tennis tournaments in Brazil Category:Hard court tennis tournaments
title: Pernambuco Brasil Open Series
